languages.text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.
languages.original_text: Способность Ближний бой влияет на эффективность атак рукопашным оружием, увеличивает показатели снижения парирования и шанса критического попадания. Способности, связанные с рукопашным боем, часто выигрывают от высокого значения Ближнего боя.

traits.locale_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.
Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.
Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

languages.text: Характеристика Ближний Бой влияет на эффективность атак рукопашным оружием, увеличивает показатели снижения парирования и шанса критического попадания. Способности, связанные с рукопашным боем, обычно усиливаются от высокого значения Ближнего Боя.

La Habilidad de armas (HA) aumenta la efectividad de tus ataques con armas cuerpo a cuerpo mejorando la reducción de parada y la probabilidad de crítico. Las capacidades de combate cuerpo a cuerpo suelen beneficiarse de esta habilidad.
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

traits.locale_text: La Habilidad de armas (HA) aumenta la efectividad de tus ataques con armas cuerpo a cuerpo mejorando la reducción de parada y la probabilidad de crítico. Las capacidades de combate cuerpo a cuerpo suelen beneficiarse de esta habilidad.

languages.text: 武器技能可以提高近战武器的攻击效果，提高招架减免与暴击率。武器技能越高，近战能力越强。
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

traits.locale_text: 武器技能可以提高近战武器的攻击效果，提高招架减免与暴击率。武器技能越高，近战能力越强。

languages.text: 近接攻撃（WS）は近接武器による攻撃の効果を高め、受け流しによる軽減量やクリティカルヒットの確率を増加させる。近接戦闘アビリティは近接攻撃が高いほどに恩恵を受けることが多い。
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

traits.locale_text: 武器スキル（WS）は近接武器による攻撃の効果を高め、受け流しによる軽減量やクリティカルヒットの確率を増加させる。近接戦闘アビリティは武器スキルが高いほどに恩恵を受けることが多い。

languages.text: Waffenfertigkeit (WF) verbessert die Effektivität von Angriffen mit Nahkampfwaffen und erhöht die Paradereduzierung und die Chance auf kritische Treffer. Nahkampffähigkeiten profitieren oft von einer hohen Waffenfertigkeit.
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

traits.locale_text: Waffenfähigkeit (WF) verbessert die Effektivität von Angriffen mit Nahkampfwaffen und erhöht die Paradereduzierung und die Chance auf kritische Treffer. Nahkampffähigkeiten profitieren oft von einer hohen Waffenfähigkeit.

languages.text: La Compétence d'arme (CA) renforce l'efficacité des attaques menées avec des armes de mêlée, en améliorant la réduction de parade et les chances de coup critique. Les capacités liées au combat de mêlée bénéficient souvent d'une Compétence d'arme élevée.
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.

traits.locale_text: La Compétence d'Arme (CA) renforce l'efficacité des attaques menées avec des armes de mêlée, en améliorant la réduction de parade et les chances d'infliger un coup critique. Les capacités liées au combat de mêlée bénéficient souvent d'une Compétence d'Arme élevée.

languages.text: Silah Yeteneği (SİY), yakın dövüş silahlarıyla yapılan saldırıların etkililiğini artırarak savuşturma azaltımı ile kritik vuruş olasılığını yükseltir. Yüksek Silah Yeteneği, yakın dövüş kabiliyetlerine de olumlu katkı yapar.
languages.original_text: Weapon Skill (WS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with melee weapons, increasing parry reduction and critical hit chance. Melee combat abilities often benefit from a high Weapon Skill.
